Developer Terms of Use
des:
Customers worldwide trust Ezlo for monitoring and control of their homes. Our platform is compatible with hundreds of devices from popular brands, all of which can now be controlled with your voice.

Ask Alexa to control your lights or activate a scene configured in your Vera app, with additional functionality for whole-home control coming soon.

Getting Started

1. To add the Ezlo Skill to Alexa go to the Alexa mobile app. Under Skills, search for “Ezlo Smart Home Control”, Select “Ezlo Control” and tap “ENABLE”.

2. You will be prompted to sign in to the Vera Portal to link your account to Alexa.

3. Next select the devices you’d like Alexa to control. You can even enter custom names for each device (e.g. Maria’s lamp, kitchen light, etc.).

a. Please Note: On the Discover Your Devices screen, be sure to avoid using any special characters such as underscore _ when customizing the device names.

4. Finally, tap “done” and then tap “DISCOVER DEVICES” or ask Alexa to “Discover Devices”. This can take up to 20 seconds.

Start living smarter today, with Ezlo and Alexa!


Supported Devices:
 - switches
 - lights
